name: Sancti Insania
description:
[WARNING]

The game is unfinished as I wasn't able to get waves working in time, only having a single repeating wave currently. In the following weeks I will try to make an update to add the unfinished content:

- 10 waves + endless wave

- Add Archangel animations

- Add particles and visual enchancements

- Add sound effects and music

- Add the Big Bad Wolf

- Redesign UI and add a boss bar

- Upload the source code

[CREDITS]

- Joaquín Álvarez: Lead Designer, Game Director, Lead Developer

- Pamela Arguijo: Character Designer, Art Designer

- Mr.Bamphiro / Martín: Ideas/Story Ideas

[STORY]

- After escaping the various demons and folkloric creatures roaming Earth, consequence of the start of the Apocalypse, Jacob arrives to a safe haven desolate island on the middle of the Pacific Ocean. Living now a more peaceful coastal life in his elderly years protecting his savior, Jacob started working on an altar and church to adorate his lord, while trying to to survive the occasional demon attack.

However, one day the sky turned completely gray, and a sense of dreafulness started to overtake the island. As Jacob started to worry and become paranoic, he heard the voice of Christ, telling him:

"Do not fear my child, for you will be granted the trust of The Lord's creations, to defend not only yourself, but my body and being aswell"

Jacob, now determined and trusting his savior's word, begins to build defenses against the coming forces.

[GUIDE]

- To spawn God's creations, you must get materials from 3 baskets inside the church. These materials are feathers, fur, and eyes. Each material is dropped by the incoming enemy forces, who need to be defeated utilising your towers.

To start off, you only have enough materials to create one Kat Tower, which will be your first companion.

When you are ready to begin the defense against the attack, come inside the church and speak to The Father's Eye

[CONTROLS]

- W: Forward

- S: Backwards

- A: Left

- D: Right

- 1: Spawn Kat Tower

- 2: Spawn Archangel Tower

- 3: Spawn Melon Tower
